settings.question: I FORGOT TO ENTER THE PROMO CODE YOU SENT ME, WHAT DO I DO?
settings.answer: If you forgot to apply a promo code to your order, please contact our customer service team immediately. We can sometimes apply the discount retroactively to orders that haven't been shipped yet.

settings.question: HOW DO I CREATE AN ACCOUNT?
settings.answer: You can create an account during checkout or by clicking 'Create Account' at the top of our website. An account will help you track orders, save addresses, and enjoy faster checkout.

settings.question: HOW DO I RESET MY PASSWORD?
settings.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. You'll receive an email with instructions to reset your password.
